0.1.2.name: wordpress/tenrikyo-service-times-widget
0.1.2.description:
This widget was built to display the current daily service times for the morning and evening services at the Tenrikyo Church Headquarters Main Sanctuary. At nearly every half a month, the service times change in sync with the times of sun rise and sun set.

Features

  • Automatically displays current service time.
  • Available in English and Japanese.
  • The title is customizable.

Future Features

  • Make translation files separate from the class file.
  • Make it easier to add events.
